languages.text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.
languages.original_text: Его территория включает в себя мириады звезд и бесчисленные людские народы, объединенные узами вида и всеобъемлющей верой в Императора. Пришельцы и мистические силы неустанно посягают на владычество Империума, вынуждая человечество сражаться в бесконечных войнах.

traits.locale_text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching Imperial faith. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humankind to fight in endless wars.

Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching Imperial faith. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humankind to fight in endless wars.

Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.

languages.text: Его территория включает в себя мириады звезд и бесчисленные людские народы, объединенные узами вида и всеобъемлющей верой в Императора. Пришельцы и мистические силы неустанно посягают на владычество Империума, вынуждая человечество сражаться в бесконечных войнах.

Sein Territorium umfasst unzählige Millionen von Sternen und zahllose Menschenleben, die durch die Bande der Spezies und den übergreifenden Glauben an den Imperator verbunden sind. Außerirdische und mystische Kräfte fordern die Vorherrschaft des Imperiums unablässig heraus und zwingen die Menschheit zu endlosen Kriegen.
languages.original_text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.

traits.locale_text: Sein Territorium umfasst unzählige Millionen von Sternen und zahllose Menschenleben, die durch die Bande der Spezies und den übergreifenden imperialen Glauben verbunden sind. Außerirdische und mystische Kräfte fordern die Vorherrschaft des Imperiums unablässig heraus und zwingen die Menschheit zu endlosen Kriegen.

languages.text: Ses territoires englobent des millions d'étoiles et d'innombrables vies humaines, unies par les liens de leur espèce et par leur foi en l'Empereur. Des forces xénos et mystiques défient sans relâche la suprématie de l'Imperium, obligeant l'Humanité à se livrer à des guerres sans fin.
languages.original_text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.

traits.locale_text: Ses territoires englobent des millions d'étoiles et d'innombrables vies humaines, unies par les liens de leur espèce et par la foi impériale. Des forces xénos et mystiques défient sans relâche la suprématie de l'Imperium, obligeant l'Humanité à se livrer à des guerres sans fin.

languages.text: 帝国疆域辽阔，领土涵盖了无数星系与不计其数的人类臣民，所有臣民都由物种本身的纽带，以及对神皇至高无上的信仰团结在一起。无数异形与神秘力量不断挑战帝国的霸权，人类也因此陷入永无休止的战争之中。
languages.original_text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.

traits.locale_text: 帝国疆域辽阔，领土涵盖了无数星系与不计其数的人类臣民，所有臣民都由物种本身的纽带，以及对神皇至高无上的信仰团结在一起。无数异形与神秘力量不断挑战帝国的霸权，人类也因此陷入永无休止的战争之中。

languages.text: その領土は数え切れない何百万もの星々と、数え切れないほどの人々の命が含まれており、種族の絆と包括的な皇帝への忠誠心によって結ばれている。異星人や謎の勢力が絶え間なく帝国の覇権に挑んでくるため、人類は終わりのない戦争を強いられている。
languages.original_text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.

traits.locale_text: その領土は数え切れない何百万もの星々と、数え切れないほどの人々の命が含まれており、種族の絆と包括的な帝国信仰によって結ばれている。異星人や謎の勢力が絶え間なく帝国の覇権に挑んでくるため、人類は終わりのない戦争を強いられている。

languages.text: Sus territorios abarcan millones de estrellas e incontables vidas humanas, unidas por la integridad de la especie y la fe en el Emperador. Los alienígenas y las fuerzas místicas desafían sin tregua la supremacía del Imperium, obligando a la Humanidad a luchar en guerras interminables.
languages.original_text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.

traits.locale_text: Sus territorios abarcan millones de estrellas e incontables vidas humanas, unidas por la integridad de la especie y la fe imperial. Los alienígenas y las fuerzas místicas desafían sin tregua la supremacía del Imperium, obligando a la Humanidad a luchar en guerras interminables.

languages.text: Toprakları milyonlarca yıldızı, türlerin bağlarıyla ve İmparator'a olan kapsayıcı bir inançla birleşen sayısız insan hayatını kapsar. Uzaylılar ve mistik güçler, İmparatorluk'un üstünlüğüne durmaksızın meydan okuyarak İnsanlığı son gelmez savaşlara sürüklerler.
languages.original_text: Its territories encompass untold millions of stars and countless more human lives, united by bonds of species and by the overarching faith in the Emperor. Aliens and mystical forces unremittingly challenge the supremacy of the Imperium, forcing Humanity to fight in endless wars.
